name: tm80
effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
